turns.speaker: client
turns.text: I need you to order a carryout pizza from Papa John's

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Which store do you want to pick it up from.

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: The one at 76th and North Oak.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Do you want to customize one or just get a signature pizza.

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: What kinds have a lot of meat?

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: They have a BBQ Meats, a The Works and one called The Meats.

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: What does The Meats have on it.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: It has pepperoni, sausage, beef, bacon and Canadian bacon.

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: What about The Works?

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: That one comes with pepperoni, Canadian bacon, spicy Italian sausage, onions, green peppers, mushrooms and black olives.

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: That one sounds good!

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: OK, The Works, what size would you like?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: The biggest one they have.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: The extra large only comes with original crust.

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Original crust is fine.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: The site allows me to adjust the amount of cheese or sauce they put on it, if you'd like.

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: No, the standard amounts are fine.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: OK, I'll order an extra large, standard crust, The Meats pizza, do you want anything else?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: No, go ahead and order it.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: OK, the order went through and it says it will be ready for pickup in about 25 minutes.

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Great, thanks!
